gov.sandia.cognition.statistics

Class KullbackLeiblerDivergence<DomainType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.sandia.cognition.statistics.KullbackLeiblerDivergence<DomainType>
  • Type Parameters:
    DomainType - The type for the domain of the two distributions which this class is comparing.

    @PublicationReference(author="Wikipedia",
                      title="Kullback--Leibler Divergence",
                      type=WebPage,
                      year=2014,
                      url="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kullback%E2%80%93Leibler_divergence")
public class KullbackLeiblerDivergence<DomainType>
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used for measuring how similar two distributions are using Kullback--Leibler Divergence.
    Since:
    3.4.2
    Author:
    trbroun
